extendedInfo.description: ââEssential smart cover app for flip cover, diary case user!ââ* Update: Eco-MODE (Setting the service pause time for battery saving) Support! [PRO VERSION]* Update: Operation-MODE Support!          - FlipCover Mode: Default Mode(For FlipCover User)          - Gestures Mode: You can turn on/off the screen by reacting to two or more times proximity sensor(For Non-FlipCover User)* Update: Exclude active of proximity sensor in a particular app* EveryCover support ver.4.0.4 and stop sensor when phone is busy!Each time you open and close the smart cover, you do not need to press the power button.EveryCover can turn on and off the screen detected by proximity sensor .Support the covinience widget to turn on/off the service.EveryCover is support every smart device if have the proximity sensor.Best choice for smart cover, flip cover, diary case, screen on/off, proximity sensor user!** The Lite is a version for testing the sensor works.   Please purchase the Pro version **[Feature]- Turning on or off the screen using sensor- Eco-MODE(Battery-Saving) Support! [Pro Version]  * Setting the service pause time for battery saving  * ex)sleep time, Hour long meeting, class..etc..- Operation-MODE Support!  * FlipCover Mode: Default Mode(For FlipCover User)  * Gestures Mode: You can turn on/off the screen by reacting to two or more times proximity sensor(For Non-FlipCover User)- A widget support to turn on service- Screen Off Delay Time Support [Pro Version]- Support the vibration when the screen turns off [Pro Version]- Stop in landscape mode (Game, Watching Movie or Camera)- AutoStart Support [Pro Version]- Service in Statusbar Icon(Avoid forced termination due to lack of resources)- Pause Sensor when you are on the phone (For Lock or Duplicate use Senser problems)- Support Exclude active of proximity sensor in a particular app- You can select Holo Light/Dark Theme.- Perfect Bug fix the malfunction in version ICS 4.0.4[Attention]If you want to delete this App,  please turn off the service and device administrator.[Support]- Please email us if app has a bug. we will support quickly as soon as possible.[Languages]- Please help translate this app to more languages!

reviews.title: I have to say , it is the only one work among all
reviews.comment: I am using Sony z ultra and this is the only one which works
reviews.author: Freddy Lao

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Its clearly in a beta-ish ohase because i had some serious bugs with the sensor. Eitherway i manage to show off every now and then with my flipcover to my friends by using this app.
reviews.author: Nathan Greene
